cRx5s6JvkrJTF7BfddyK4b"]},"contracts/tokens/erc20/types/ERC20Target.sol":{"keccak256":"0xbf94c1d68bf2beecef6d09c18bd0c075942f0cd97e12a4c4d8bbdcd3aa081747","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://fd13ec0c22387d291b140712600eff89b300caf92fdfcf65c57cdc0cf9db7e88","dweb:/ipfs/Qmbwz8jYbECyF3spw6i2NyKtgc3tevhG6JNdq4N6jzuoxQ"]},"contracts/tokens/erc6903/interfaces/IERC6093.sol":{"keccak256":"0xe1b1d11cd44266c90b4477b505a771bf313cd68cc5ac9a24007c6ca23fe1f4f7","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://79c2e295180e46b7702d366ac2867f8bd1a6bbed180dba1bfe07e24c1a36c266","dweb:/ipfs/QmSZYe2Hu3nfGCvrcUm2tGVmb7uXirpD12feuUb1znirYg"]}},"version":1}

approve(address,uint256).details: prefer ERC20Extended functions to avoid transaction-ordering vulnerability(see https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729)

params.amount: quantity of tokens approved for spending

returns.result: status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

returns._0: Stated precision for determining a single unit of account.

decreaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically decreases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address. - `spender` must have allowance for the caller of at least `subtractedValue`.

increaseAllowance(address,uint256).details: Atomically increases the allowance granted to `spender` by the caller. This is an alternative to {approve} that can be used as a mitigation for problems described in {IERC20-approve}. Emits an {Approval} event indicating the updated allowance. Requirements: - `spender` cannot be the zero address.

returns.result: success status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

params.holder: holder of tokens prior to transfer

returns.result: status (always true; otherwise function should revert)

allowance(address,address).notice: query the allowance granted from given holder to given spender

approve(address,uint256).notice: grant approval to spender to spend tokens

balanceOf(address).notice: query the token balance of given account

totalSupply().notice: query the total minted token supply

transferFrom(address,address,uint256).notice: transfer tokens to given recipient on behalf of given holder
